mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (guid, username, password, enabled, email) VALUES (#{guid}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{enabled}, #{email})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{userName}, password = #{password}, enabled = #{enabled}, email = #{email} WHERE guid = #{guid} AND number > 0
mapper.select: SELECT m.username, m.password, m.email FROM users m WHERE userName = #{userName}
